value:
$WmMPID_ジョルジュ,ch01_05_Jorjue_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I see you've continued to improve,
Gordin... You may even be ready to
challenge me, wouldn't you say?$k$p$WmMPID_ゴードン,ch01_04_Gohdon_M_Normal,Face|$w0|N-no, I couldn't! The only reason I'm
getting any better at all is because
you and the others help me so much!$k$p$Sbs1000|
